text: Metrannus was the Patrician of Provence around the year 700, when he appeared in control of Marseille according to the Passio Leudegarii. ==Sources== *Lewis, Archibald R. "The Dukes in the Regnum Francorum, A.D. 550-751." Speculum, Vol. 51, No 3 (July 1976), pp 381-410\. Category:8th-century deaths Category:Year of birth unknown Category:8th-century Frankish nobility
title: Metrannus of Provence
